contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Yellow-throated Squirrel | status = DD | status_system = iucn3.1 | status_ref = <ref name=iucn>{{IUCN2008|assessors=Amori, G., Koprowski, J. & Roth, L.|year=2008|id=20009|title=Sciurus gilvigularis|downloaded=6 January 2009}}</ref> | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Mammal]]ia | ordo = [[Rodent]]ia | familia = [[Sciuridae]] | genus = ''[[Sciurus]]'' | subgenus = ''[[Guerlinguetus]]'' | species = '''''S. gilvigularis''''' | binomial = ''Sciurus gilvigularis'' | binomial_authority = [[Johann Andreas Wagner|Wagner]], 1842 | subdivision_ranks = [[Subspecies]]<ref name="Thorington">{{cite book|last1=Thorington|first1=R.W., Jr.|last2=Hoffmann|first2=R.S.|year=2005|pages=754â€“818|editor1-last=Wilson|editor1-first=D.E.|editor2-last=Reeder|editor2-first=D.M|url=http://www.bucknell.edu/msw3|chapter=Sciurus (Guerlinguetus) gilvigularis|chapterurl=http://www.bucknell.edu/msw3/browse.asp?s=y&id=12400122|title=Mammal Species of the World: a taxonomic and geographic reference|edition=3rd|publisher=The Johns Hopkins University Press|isbn=0-8018-8221-4|oclc=26158608}}</ref> | subdivision = * ''S. g. gilvigularis'' * ''S. g. paraensis'' }} The '''yellow-throated squirrel''' (''Sciurus gilvigularis'') is a [[tree squirrel]] in the genus ''[[Sciurus]]'' [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[South America]]. It is found in [[Brazil]], [[Guyana]] and [[Venezuela]]. ==References== {{reflist}} *[http://www.natureserve.org Naturerve.org] {{S. Sciurinae1 nav}} [[Category:Sciurus]] [[Category:Mammals of South America]] [[Category:Mammals of Brazil]] [[Category:Mammals of Guyana|Squirrel, Yellow-throated]] {{Squirrel-stub}}
